title: Changing the intention for Umrah
transcript: attention from our home to make Om and on the road while reaching Midway to Mecca she says that I changed my mind instead of doing it for myself I want to make it for my grandfather who passed away 20 years ago so can I change the intentions the answer is no once your intention is fixed and that is it you cannot change it you cannot cancel it you cannot void it you cannot waver it it has to be as you have uh done it
